errors.name: ExtraMultiplierMovementBpTooHigh
errors.msg: Extra multiplier movement BP too high

errors.name: InputMustBeOwnedByOperator
errors.msg: Input must be owned by operator

fields.name: last_index_bid_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_ask_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap_5min
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_index_price_twap_ts
docs: unix_timestamp of last snapshot

fields.name: last_oracle_price
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_conf
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_delay
docs: number of slots since last update

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap_5min
docs: precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_oracle_price_twap_ts
docs: unix_timestamp of last snapshot

fields.name: slot
docs: The slot the order was placed

fields.name: price
docs: The limit price for the order (can be 0 for market orders)
For orders with an auction, this price isn't used until the auction is complete
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount
docs: The size of the order
precision for perps: BASE_PRECISION
precision for spot: token mint precision

fields.name: base_asset_amount_filled
docs: The amount of the order filled
precision for perps: BASE_PRECISION
precision for spot: token mint precision

fields.name: quote_asset_amount_filled
docs: The amount of quote filled for the order
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: trigger_price
docs: At what price the order will be triggered. Only relevant for trigger orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: auction_start_price
docs: The start price for the auction. Only relevant for market/oracle orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: auction_end_price
docs: The end price for the auction. Only relevant for market/oracle orders
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_ts
docs: The time when the order will expire

fields.name: oracle_price_offset
docs: If set, the order limit price is the oracle price + this offset
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: order_id
docs: The id for the order. Each users has their own order id space

fields.name: market_index
docs: The perp/spot market index

fields.name: status
docs: Whether the order is open or unused

fields.name: order_type
docs: The type of order

fields.name: market_type
docs: Whether market is spot or perp

fields.name: user_order_id
docs: User generated order id. Can make it easier to place/cancel orders

fields.name: existing_position_direction
docs: What the users position was when the order was placed

fields.name: direction
docs: Whether the user is going long or short. LONG = bid, SHORT = ask

fields.name: reduce_only
docs: Whether the order is allowed to only reduce position size

fields.name: post_only
docs: Whether the order must be a maker

fields.name: immediate_or_cancel
docs: Whether the order must be canceled the same slot it is placed

fields.name: trigger_condition
docs: Whether the order is triggered above or below the trigger price. Only relevant for trigger orders

fields.name: auction_duration
docs: How many slots the auction lasts

fields.name: last_cumulative_funding_rate
docs: The perp market's last cumulative funding rate. Used to calculate the funding payment owed to user
precision: FUNDING_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: base_asset_amount
docs: the size of the users perp position
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_asset_amount
docs: Used to calculate the users pnl. Upon entry, is equal to base_asset_amount * avg entry price - fees
Updated when the user open/closes position or settles pnl. Includes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_break_even_amount
docs: The amount of quote the user would need to exit their position at to break even
Updated when the user open/closes position or settles pnl. Includes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: quote_entry_amount
docs: The amount quote the user entered the position with. Equal to base asset amount * avg entry price
Updated when the user open/closes position. Excludes fees/funding
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_bids
docs: The amount of open bids the user has in this perp market
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_asks
docs: The amount of open asks the user has in this perp market
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: settled_pnl
docs: The amount of pnl settled in this market since opening the position
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: lp_shares
docs: The number of lp (liquidity provider) shares the user has in this perp market
LP shares allow users to provide liquidity via the AMM
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_base_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: The last base asset amount per lp the amm had
Used to settle the users lp position
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_quote_asset_amount_per_lp
docs: The last quote asset amount per lp the amm had
Used to settle the users lp position
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: remainder_base_asset_amount
docs: Settling LP position can lead to a small amount of base asset being left over smaller than step size
This records that remainder so it can be settled later on
precision: BASE_PRECISION

fields.name: market_index
docs: The market index for the perp market

fields.name: open_orders
docs: The number of open orders

fields.name: scaled_balance
docs: To get the pool's token amount, you must multiply the scaled balance by the market's cumulative
deposit interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: market_index
docs: The spot market the pool is for

types.name: SecondaryVaultState
docs: vault-state address is PDA(main_state, token_mint)

fields.name: lst_mint
docs: the LST type stored in this vault

fields.name: lst_sol_price_p32
docs: LST-token/SOL price with 32-bit precision, cache of last computation of LST-token/SOL price,
it is computed as `token_sol_price_p32 = LST-backing-lamports * 2^32 / LST-mint-supply`
it is used to compute vault.sol_value.
To obtain a human-readable price do: human_readable_price = token_sol_price_p32 / 2^32
invariant: token_sol_price_p32 >= 2^32, because the min value for 1 LST is 1 SOL

fields.name: lst_sol_price_timestamp
docs: last computation of token_sol_price, price is obtained ON-CHAIN, read from the LST token program state

fields.name: vault_total_lst_amount
docs: total lst amount backing this vault_total_sol_value
To compute SOL value of the entire vault use: vault_total_lst_amount * lst_token_sol_price
invariant: vault_total_token_amount = in_strategies_amount + locally_stored_amount

fields.name: locally_stored_amount
docs: token amount here (not in strategies)
invariant: vault_total_lst_amount = in_strategies_amount + locally_stored_amount
must eventually match vault_lst_ata (PDA ATA token account)

fields.name: in_strategies_amount
docs: token amount sent to strategies (belongs to this vault, part of assets, but not in vault_token_account)
invariant: vault_total_lst_amount = in_strategies_amount + locally_stored_amount

fields.name: tickets_target_sol_amount
docs: "tickets_target_sol_amount" is set by the ticket-fulfiller crank, so this vault removes tokens from strategies
increasing "locally_stored_amount" until it covers "tickets_target_sol_amount"
in order to compute how much tokens are free to send to strategies, you must use fn `available_for_strategies_amount()`
that subtracts this value from locally_stored_amount

fields.name: deposits_disabled
docs: if true: only-withdraw mode

fields.name: token_deposit_cap
docs: 0 means no cap - measured in vault accepted tokens

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The address of the spot market. It is a pda of the market index

fields.name: oracle
docs: The oracle used to price the markets deposits/borrows

fields.name: mint
docs: The token mint of the market

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault used to store the market's deposits
The amount in the vault should be equal to or greater than deposits - borrows

fields.name: name
docs: The encoded display name for the market e.g. SOL

fields.name: revenue_pool
docs: Revenue the protocol has collected in this markets token
e.g. for SOL-PERP, funds can be settled in usdc and will flow into the USDC revenue pool

fields.name: spot_fee_pool
docs: The fees collected from swaps between this market and the quote market
Is settled to the quote markets revenue pool

fields.name: insurance_fund
docs: Details on the insurance fund covering bankruptcies in this markets token
Covers bankruptcies for borrows with this markets token and perps settling in this markets token

fields.name: total_spot_fee
docs: The total spot fees collected for this market
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: deposit_balance
docs: The sum of the scaled balances for deposits across users and pool balances
To convert to the deposit token amount, multiply by the cumulative deposit interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: borrow_balance
docs: The sum of the scaled balances for borrows across users and pool balances
To convert to the borrow token amount, multiply by the cumulative borrow interest
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_deposit_interest
docs: The cumulative interest earned by depositors
Used to calculate the deposit token amount from the deposit balance
precision: SPOT_CUMULATIVE_INTEREST_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_borrow_interest
docs: The cumulative interest earned by borrowers
Used to calculate the borrow token amount from the borrow balance
precision: SPOT_CUMULATIVE_INTEREST_PRECISION

fields.name: total_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss from borrows, in the mint's token
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: total_quote_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss from borrows, in the quote market's token
preicision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: withdraw_guard_threshold
docs: no withdraw limits/guards when deposits below this threshold
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: max_token_deposits
docs: The max amount of token deposits in this market
0 if there is no limit
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: deposit_token_twap
docs: 24hr average of deposit token amount
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: borrow_token_twap
docs: 24hr average of borrow token amount
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: utilization_twap
docs: 24hr average of utilization
which is borrow amount over token amount
precision: SPOT_UTILIZATION_PRECISION

fields.name: last_interest_ts
docs: Last time the cumulative deposit and borrow interest was updated

fields.name: last_twap_ts
docs: Last time the deposit/borrow/utilization averages were updated

fields.name: expiry_ts
docs: The time the market is set to expire. Only set if market is in reduce only mode

fields.name: order_step_size
docs: Spot orders must be a multiple of the step size
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: order_tick_size
docs: Spot orders must be a multiple of the tick size
precision: PRICE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_order_size
docs: The minimum order size
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: max_position_size
docs: The maximum spot position size
if the limit is 0, there is no limit
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: next_fill_record_id
docs: Every spot trade has a fill record id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: next_deposit_record_id
docs: Every deposit has a deposit record id. This is the next id to use

fields.name: initial_asset_weight
docs: The initial asset weight used to calculate a deposits contribution to a users initial total collateral
e.g. if the asset weight is .8, $100 of deposits contributes $80 to the users initial total collateral
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: maintenance_asset_weight
docs: The maintenance asset weight used to calculate a deposits contribution to a users maintenance total collateral
e.g. if the asset weight is .9, $100 of deposits contributes $90 to the users maintenance total collateral
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: initial_liability_weight
docs: The initial liability weight used to calculate a borrows contribution to a users initial margin requirement
e.g. if the liability weight is .9, $100 of borrows contributes $90 to the users initial margin requirement
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: maintenance_liability_weight
docs: The maintenance liability weight used to calculate a borrows contribution to a users maintenance margin requirement
e.g. if the liability weight is .8, $100 of borrows contributes $80 to the users maintenance margin requirement
precision: SPOT_WEIGHT_PRECISION

fields.name: imf_factor
docs: The initial margin fraction factor. Used to increase liability weight/decrease asset weight for large positions
precision: MARGIN_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidator_fee
docs: The fee the liquidator is paid for taking over borrow/deposit
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: if_liquidation_fee
docs: The fee the insurance fund receives from liquidation
precision: LIQUIDATOR_FEE_PRECISION

fields.name: optimal_utilization
docs: The optimal utilization rate for this market.
Used to determine the markets borrow rate
precision: SPOT_UTILIZATION_PRECISION

fields.name: optimal_borrow_rate
docs: The borrow rate for this market when the market has optimal utilization
precision: SPOT_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: max_borrow_rate
docs: The borrow rate for this market when the market has 1000 utilization
precision: SPOT_RATE_PRECISION

fields.name: decimals
docs: The market's token mint's decimals. To from decimals to a precision, 10^decimals

fields.name: orders_enabled
docs: Whether or not spot trading is enabled

fields.name: asset_tier
docs: The asset tier affects how a deposit can be used as collateral and the priority for a borrow being liquidated

fields.name: max_token_borrows_fraction
docs: What fraction of max_token_deposits
disabled when 0, 1 => 1/10000 => .01% of max_token_deposits
precision: X/10000

fields.name: flash_loan_amount
docs: For swaps, the amount of token loaned out in the begin_swap ix
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: flash_loan_initial_token_amount
docs: For swaps, the amount in the users token account in the begin_swap ix
Used to calculate how much of the token left the system in end_swap ix
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: total_swap_fee
docs: The total fees received from swaps
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: scale_initial_asset_weight_start
docs: When to begin scaling down the initial asset weight
disabled when 0
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: min_borrow_rate
docs: The min borrow rate for this market when the market regardless of utilization
precision: X/200

fields.name: fuel_boost_deposits
docs: fuel multiplier for spot deposits
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_borrows
docs: fuel multiplier for spot borrows
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_taker
docs: fuel multiplier for spot taker
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_maker
docs: fuel multiplier for spot maker
precision: 10

fields.name: fuel_boost_insurance
docs: fuel multiplier for spot insurance stake
precision: 10

fields.name: scaled_balance
docs: The scaled balance of the position. To get the token amount, multiply by the cumulative deposit/borrow
interest of corresponding market.
precision: SPOT_BALANCE_PRECISION

fields.name: open_bids
docs: How many spot bids the user has open
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: open_asks
docs: How many spot asks the user has open
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: cumulative_deposits
docs: The cumulative deposits/borrows a user has made into a market
precision: token mint precision

fields.name: market_index
docs: The market index of the corresponding spot market

fields.name: balance_type
docs: Whether the position is deposit or borrow

fields.name: open_orders
docs: Number of open orders

fields.name: authority
docs: The owner/authority of the account

fields.name: delegate
docs: An addresses that can control the account on the authority's behalf. Has limited power, cant withdraw

fields.name: name
docs: Encoded display name e.g. "toly"

fields.name: spot_positions
docs: The user's spot positions

fields.name: perp_positions
docs: The user's perp positions

fields.name: orders
docs: The user's orders

fields.name: last_add_perp_lp_shares_ts
docs: The last time the user added perp lp positions

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: The total values of deposits the user has made
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: The total values of withdrawals the user has made
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: total_social_loss
docs: The total socialized loss the users has incurred upon the protocol
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: settled_perp_pnl
docs: Fees (taker fees, maker rebate, referrer reward, filler reward) and pnl for perps
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_spot_fees
docs: Fees (taker fees, maker rebate, filler reward) for spot
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: cumulative_perp_funding
docs: Cumulative funding paid/received for perps
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: liquidation_margin_freed
docs: The amount of margin freed during liquidation. Used to force the liquidation to occur over a period of time
Defaults to zero when not being liquidated
precision: QUOTE_PRECISION

fields.name: last_active_slot
docs: The last slot a user was active. Used to determine if a user is idle

fields.name: next_order_id
docs: Every user order has an order id. This is the next order id to be used

fields.name: max_margin_ratio
docs: Custom max initial margin ratio for the user

fields.name: next_liquidation_id
docs: The next liquidation id to be used for user

fields.name: sub_account_id
docs: The sub account id for this user

fields.name: status
docs: Whether the user is active, being liquidated or bankrupt

fields.name: is_margin_trading_enabled
docs: Whether the user has enabled margin trading

fields.name: idle
docs: User is idle if they haven't interacted with the protocol in 1 week and they have no orders, perp positions or borrows
Off-chain keeper bots can ignore users that are idle

fields.name: open_orders
docs: number of open orders

fields.name: has_open_order
docs: Whether or not user has open order

fields.name: open_auctions
docs: number of open orders with auction

fields.name: has_open_auction
docs: Whether or not user has open order with auction

types.name: VaultStrategyRelationEntry
docs: state created when a CommonVaultStrategyState is attached to a secondary-vault
main_state + lst_mint + common_strategy_state => VaultStrategyRelationEntry PDA

fields.name: lst_mint
docs: main_state + lst_mint => secondary-vault PDA

fields.name: common_strategy_state
docs: Several common_strategy_state accounts can exist for a single strategy_program_code
Each common_strategy_state account has a common first part struct `CommonVaultStrategyState`
and it references A SPECIFIC LST mint & vault. Yields are computed in that lst.
PDAs:
this-program + main_state + lst_mint + common_strategy_state => VaultStrategyRelationEntry PDA
strategy_program_code + common_strategy_state + "AUTH" => strategy-Auth-PDA
associated-token-program + lst_mint + strategy-Auth-PDA => strategy-lst-ATA holding CommonVaultStrategyState.locally_stored_amount

fields.name: strategy_program_code
docs: strategy program code, owner of common_strategy_state

fields.name: next_withdraw_lst_amount
docs: target amount for the next withdraw
the strat should wind-down positions so this amount can be withdrawn
once withdrawn (call to strat-program) and in the same tx, set this value to zero

fields.name: tickets_target_sol_amount
docs: "tickets_target_sol_amount" is set by the ticket-fulfiller crank, so the strat removes tokens from external-programs
increasing "locally_stored_amount" until it covers "tickets_target_sol_amount"
in order to compute how much tokens are free to send to external-programs, do: locally_stored_amount - lst_value(tickets_target_sol_amount)

fields.name: last_read_strat_lst_amount
docs: last computation of lst-token amount in the strategy.
When the `common_strategy_state.strat_total_lst_amount` increases above `last_strat_lst_amount`, a profit is recorded
Incremented when depositing the LST token in the strategy
Reduced manually when removing LST tokens from the strategy
Incremented during strategy-amount-update, if the strategy generated yield in the form of more lst tokens
